1.title: Going to Pot in Portland

episode of.title: Russell Howard & Mum: USA Road Trip (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: Russell and his mum, Ninette have arrived in Portland, Oregon. It is one of the few American States where cannabis is legal to use recreationally so the Howards are literally going to pot. While they are getting up close and personal with all things cannabis, the big question is: will Ninette have a go on the demon weed?

2.title: Beauty Pageanting in Vegas

episode of.title: Russell Howard & Mum: USA Road Trip (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot: Russell and Ninette have arrived in Las Vegas on their All-American Road Trip. While in Sin City, the Howards have been invited to be guest judges at the Mrs. Globe Beauty Pageant, a competition for women of all ages. In order to judge women, Russell must first understand what it takes to be a beauty queen.

3.title: Rocking Out in LA

episode of.title: Russell Howard & Mum: USA Road Trip (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot: Russell and his mum, Ninette, are in LA and they are ready to rock. They are enrolling in the Rock and Roll Fantasy Camp, where they have 48 hours to become full blown guitar heroes and perform their first ever gig in the heart of Hollywood. There is one snag, neither of them can play a note.

4.title: Cowboy Ranching in Oregon

episode of.title: Russell Howard & Mum: USA Road Trip (TV Series 2016– )

4.plot: Russell and Ninette's All-American Road Trip has brought them west. The Wild West to be exact. They are in cowboy country and are saddling up for a mission to become real life ranchers on the old frontier, before riding off on their first ever cattle drive.

5.title: Being Happy in Naples

episode of.title: Russell Howard & Mum: USA Road Trip (TV Series 2016– )

5.plot: Russell and Ninette's American Road Trip has brought them to the place voted the happiest city to live in in the USA: Naples, Florida. While in the happy capital, the Howards are on a mission to uncover if this mecca of merriment can infect them with happiness and reveal the secret to eternal joy.

6.title: Side Showing at The State Fair

episode of.title: Russell Howard & Mum: USA Road Trip (TV Series 2016– )

6.plot: It's the 4th of July so Russell and his mum, Ninette, are visiting an All-American State Fair in Indiana to join in the celebrations. However their Independence Day is going to be anything but traditional as they have been invited to run away with the circus for the weekend and join an old fashioned American Side Show.

1.title: Alien Hunting in Nevada

episode of.title: Russell Howard & Mum: USA Road Trip (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: Russell and his mum are off in search of alien life, they're heading to the UFO capital of the USA: Nevada. Russell and Ninette join an alien abductee support group, and meet a woman who can show them how to communicate with extra-terrestrials before they venture out to an alien hot spot in a bid to make contact.

2.title: Survival Prepping in Utah

episode of.title: Russell Howard & Mum: USA Road Trip (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot: Russell and Ninette have come to Utah to meet and train with the Preppers, people who are all set for Armageddon. The Howards team up with a crack team who prepare them and transform them into action heroes so they are ready to face the Zombie Apocalypse - although it may be Ninette who can teach the Preppers a thing or two.

3.title: Hip Hopping in Atlanta

episode of.title: Russell Howard & Mum: USA Road Trip (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot: Russell and his mum find themselves in the Hip Hop Capital of the USA: Atlanta, Georgia. Under the guidance of local legend, Dr. Dax, the Howard's attempt to transform themselves into rapping, dancing, graffiti-ing hip hop heroes.

4.title: Ghost Hunting in Savannah

episode of.title: Russell Howard & Mum: USA Road Trip (TV Series 2016– )

4.plot: Russell and his mum are heading to one the USA's most haunted cities: Savannah, Georgia in the Deep South. During their stay, the Howards are set for a whole host of paranormal activities; they are booked into a haunted hotel, are trained to become Ghost Hunters and agree to spend the night at Savannah's most Haunted House.

5.title: Hot-Rodding at the Demolition Derby (South Carolina)

episode of.title: Russell Howard & Mum: USA Road Trip (TV Series 2016– )

5.plot: Russell and his mum are in South Carolina, where they have joined the Knights of Destruction, an All-American Demolition Derby, who find new and insane ways to smash up cars. Russell has signed up to get behind the wheel at the event and Ninette is taking to the mic to commentate in front of the 4000 strong crowd.

6.title: Fabulous Dogs of New York

episode of.title: Russell Howard & Mum: USA Road Trip (TV Series 2016– )

6.plot: Russell and his mum's American Adventure has led them to the Big Apple, where they are doing things doggy style. They are getting up close and personal with some of Manhattan's most pampered and preened pooches, where they will fully experience the New York Dog Scene, including hanging out with its Bona-Fido doggy stars.

imdb.title: Russell Howard & Mum: USA Road Trip
akas: Russell Howard & Mum: USA Road Trip (United Kingdom)
plot: Comedy Central factual travel series starring Russell Howard and his mum. 12 episodes (2 series), 2016 - 2018. Features Russell Howard and Ninette Howard.
